name: Knock-Off Tetris
description:
A second project of my journey as an indie developer, second week in recreating old classic games and this one was fun to develop. As I am progressing as a game developer, I will greatly appreciate any feedback that you can give!

Music was made by David Renda from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6
